mapper.insert: insert into t_ver_code(code_user_id, code_value, code_create_time) values (#{codeUserId}, #{codeValue}, #{codeCreateTime})
mapper.select: select code_id as codeId, code_user_id as codeUserId, code_value as codeValue, code_create_time as codeCreateTime from t_ver_code where code_user_id=#{codeUserId} and code_value=#{codeValue} order by code_id desc
